title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - v2.0
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the FraudBuster project, including: input data sources (transactional data, user behavior data, third-party APIs), fraud detection rules, machine learning models (with a focus on anomaly detection algorithms such as Isolation Forest, One-Class SVM, etc., consider using ensemble methods to improve overall performance), performance targets (latency, throughput, accuracy), integration with existing systems (APIs, databases), and documentation of all implemented components. Also, ensure the design accounts for scalability, security aspects (incorporate encryption, access controls, and auditing mechanisms), and consider future growth by designing components to be easily upgradable or replaceable. Lastly, provide a clear plan for testing and validation to ensure the system's reliability.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, rule-based fraud detection, machine learning model training and inference, and integration with databases and other systems.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop a high-performance data ingestion pipeline to collect and preprocess data from various sources for fraud detection.

title: Develop Rule-based Fraud Detection Module
description: Implement a rule-based fraud detection module based on predefined rules and patterns.

title: Implement Machine Learning Fraud Detection
description: Develop a machine learning pipeline for training and deploying fraud detection models, including data preprocessing, model training, and model serving.

title: Design and Implement High-Performance Database Solution
description: Design and implement a high-performance database solution to store and retrieve fraud detection data and results efficiently.

title: Develop User Interface and Reporting
description: Create a user interface and reporting tools for monitoring fraud detection results, configuring rules, and managing machine learning models.
dependencies: Design and Implement High-Performance Database Solution

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure the system's integrity and protect sensitive data.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the FraudBuster system.
dependencies: Design and Implement High-Performance Database Solution

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Design and Implement High-Performance Database Solution

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides, to support the deployment and maintenance of the FraudBuster system.
dependencies: Design and Implement High-Performance Database Solution
